appDesc.message: שחק סודוקו בכל עת, משחק הפאזל נמצא תמיד בדפדפן שלך!

appLabelHTU1.message: By clicking on the button, you can put a number in the cell that will not be calculated as a result, but use it as a note

appLabelHTU2.message: You can put 4 numbers in one cell at the same time.

appLabelHTU4.message: - by putting the number in the normal mode

appLabelHTU6.message: - pressing Backspace - delete one by one

appLabelHTU7.message: - by clicking on the number again

appLabelRules.message:
Put numbers from 1 to 9 without duplicate:
- each row
- each column
- each 3×3 section.

appLabelControls.message: Click on the cell and use your keyboard to type in the numbers.

appLabelConfirm.message: Click Yes to finish the current game.
